segments.text: It seems that something is praying heavy on you.What ’ s the matter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got my father ’ s goat last night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did you do to get his goat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When I asked him to treat me like he does to my sisters , he jumped down my throat . So I took it out on him by telling him what I thought .
segments.speaker: S2
